input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Watch Timex TW2V37400 Waterbury Ocean Man 42mm Plastic'
  - Name='Timex Men's Falcon Eye Chronograph'
  - Name='Timex Men's Colorado Rockies Resin Watch'
  - Name='Timex Womens Expedition Fabric Strap Digital Chronograph Watch T49661JT'
  - Name='Timex Men's Marlin Jet Automatic Stainless Steel'
  - Name='Men's T5K195 Timex Ironman Triathlon Watch'
  - Name='Men's Timex Expedition Field Leather Watch T449219J'
  - Name='Q Timex Men's GMT 38mm Watch'
  - Name='Timex Marlin Chronograph Watch TW2W99100'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Sport Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Chronograph Quartz Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Michigan Wolverines Eco-Drive Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Field Mechanical Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Marine Star Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Tissot T-Touch Connect Solar Men's Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Bethune-Cookman Wildcats Classic Sport Watch'
  - Name='Tissot Stylist Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Eco-Drive Sport Luxury Women's Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Shelby x Fossil Grand Tourer Limited-Edition Watch Set'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Sport Tourer Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Seiko 5 Sports SRPH31 Blue Dial Men's Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Classic Chronograph Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Field Quartz Watch'
  - Name='Antique Vintage Citizen Military Trench Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-drive Analog Round Watch'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Watch Timex TW2V37400 Waterbury Ocean Man 42mm Plastic
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While it is a Timex watch, this model has a larger plastic case and ocean theme, differing from the titanium, adventure-focused Expedition Scout.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Falcon Eye Chronograph
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and similar size but a chronograph with likely different materials and style; less focused on ruggedness and titanium construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Colorado Rockies Resin Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Timex brand but uses resin and has a sports team theme, differing in materials and intended rugged adventure use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Womens Expedition Fabric Strap Digital Chronograph Watch T49661JT
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Part of the Expedition line sharing adventure focus, though digital and fabric strap differ from titanium quartz analog design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Marlin Jet Automatic Stainless Steel
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Timex mechanical automatic but stainless steel and classic Marlin line, less aligned with rugged titanium quartz field watch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's T5K195 Timex Ironman Triathlon Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Timex sports watch optimized for triathlon, digital and plastic, differing from analog, titanium, field/adventure watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Timex Expedition Field Leather Watch T449219J
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Timex Expedition field watch with leather strap shares similar rugged styling, use case, and analog quartz movement, close to reference though materials differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Q Timex Men's GMT 38mm Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar watch size and brand; Q Timex is quartz with classic features and similar case size, somewhat aligned with daily wearable rugged watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Marlin Chronograph Watch TW2W99100
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Marlin series is dressier and mechanical/chronograph focused, differing in rugged adventure style and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Sport Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Citizen brand sports watch with stainless steel case similar in function but different brand and lacks titanium and specific expedition features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Chronograph Quartz Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Citizen quartz chronograph with eco-drive; similar size and function but different brand and less focused on field expedition features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Michigan Wolverines Eco-Drive Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Citizen brand with collegiate theme, stainless steel; more casual and branded as sports fan watch, less rugged field focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Mechanical Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly relevant; similar field watch style, durable construction, mechanical movement but similar rugged functionality and classic field design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Marine Star Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bulova sport watch with stainless steel marine focus; decent outdoor function but less field watch style and different materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot T-Touch Connect Solar Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Advanced features with solar and touch technology; outdoor focus but more tech-heavy diver style; different core design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Bethune-Cookman Wildcats Classic Sport Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bulova branded sport watch tied to a college, more fashion oriented and less outdoors rugged field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Stylist Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a fashion watch, much less related to rugged field or expedition style or construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Eco-Drive Sport Luxury Women's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's sport luxury watch with eco-drive; different purpose and style from rugged men's expedition titanium watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Shelby x Fossil Grand Tourer Limited-Edition Watch Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fashion and limited edition chronograph set, more style oriented than functional rugged field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Sport Tourer Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sport chronograph likely with plastic or steel casing, less rugged outdoor field watch characteristics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko 5 Sports SRPH31 Blue Dial Men's Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic sports watch with robust build; similar size and function, good relevance though titanium and quartz differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Classic Chronograph Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic chronograph focus, less rugged material and field-use design compared to titanium quartz expedition watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Quartz Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Almost identical function and style as reference; quartz field watch with rugged design highly aligned in purpose and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Antique Vintage Citizen Military Trench Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Vintage military style aligns with field watch heritage, though vintage nature and materials differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-drive Analog Round Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Citizen analog eco-drive with round case similar in use, but different brand and likely less rugged than titanium expedition watch.
